casebody.data:
STATE
v.
ROMERO. 2017-0915 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 2, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On review of jurisdictional memorandum of the Ohio Public Defender. The court affirms its decision to accept the appeal. The stay of briefing is lifted and appellant shall file a merit brief within 40 days. The parties shall otherwise proceed in accordance with S.Ct.Prac.R. 16.02 through 16.07.

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, and DeWine, JJ., concur.

DeGenaro, J., not participating.
